page.title: 08Boughton's By-pass
page.content: Being on the major route,(ref.p.1), Boughton-under-Blean has had grave problems with traffic during modern times.Luckily in 1976 the by-pass was opened to alleviate this problem. We have carried out a traffic census to see what the conditions would be like in The Street had the by-pass not been built. The survey was carried out during part of a morning and afternoon.One part of the survey was taken from the by-pass bridge,and the other from the School Lane section of The Street. The results represent a 10 hour period of a weekday. {NO.OF VEHICLES on BY-PASS 17,520 {NO.OF VEHICLES in THE STREET 2,220 {NO.that could use THE STREET 19,740
